name: amphtml-validator
description: VSCode extension for AMP HTML validator
author: Dipak Parikh

amphtml.validator.enabled.description: *NOT IMPLEMENTED* Control whether AMP HTML validator is enabled for HTML files or not.

amphtml.validator.documentSelector.description: *NOT IMPLEMENTED* The associated AMP HTML document types to be linted.

amphtml.validator.keepIssuesAfterDocumen.description: *NOT IMPLEMENTED* Control whether AMP HTML validator errors/warnings are cleared when document is closed.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run compile:client && npm run compile:server
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
